input: Causing a series to gain resistors will result in a/an _____ in the total resistance of the circuit.As more resistors are added in series, the total resistance of the circuit increases.
Drake goes to the gym every day and works out. The more time that Drake spends exercising, his muscles will beAnaerobic exercises cause muscles to get bigger and stronger.

A group of settlers decided to live close to one aquifer instead of another aquifer because the aquifer they chose was much closer to the surface. Getting water from the aquifer closer to the surface will beThe closer to the surface an aquifer is, the easier it is to get the water.

John is from the US. When he visited a third world country, he noticed the use of energy resources there wasRicher nations use far more energy resources, especially fossil fuels, than poorer nations do.
If the people in Mary's country start to create more greenhouse gases, what will happen to the possibility that changes may occur?As greenhouse gases increase, changes will be more extreme.
If a product is unstretched, elastic force willThe elastic force increases the more the material is stretched or compressed.
A warming resistor will _____ in resistance.The hotter a resistor becomes the more resistance it has.
Eric removes resistors in parallel to a circuit. The total currentWhen we add resistors in parallel to each other the total resistance decreases and the current increases.
